column4: I would like Totem to display a video correctly transformed in Compiz Cube while it rotates. Totem seems to use some Overlay mode. How can I make it display the video in "frame buffer mode"?
gstreamer-properties ; in the Video tab select X window system(X11/XShm/Xv
thanks, i had to use the other X option: "X Window System (No Xv)" though.
omg it's full of slow! any ideas? (my pc is old) or do i have to live with it
